description: Goals from Andy Ryan and Dylan help Premiership champions Larne to a 2-1 home win over Ballymena United. Andy Scott netted for United while Kym Nelson saw his goal ruled out for offside.
title: Highlights: Larne overcome Sky Blues at Inver Park
title_page: Highlights: Larne overcome Sky Blues at Inver Park - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goals from Andy Ryan and Dylan help Premiership champions Larne to a 2-1 home win over Ballymena United.
Andy Scott netted for United while Kym Nelson saw his goal ruled out for offside.
